data.name: Button_Fail_Part1
data.value: Button panel for starting mission '

data.name: Button_Fail_Part2
data.value: ' was destroyed. Load your last safe ([f5]) to restore your progress or continue on without access to the final objective.

data.name: Description
data.value: Restore an old outpost to act as your base of operations and explore the remains of what a once thriving industry left behind. Learn about space engineering or pick a fight, the choice is yours, this is where your career begins!

data.name: Fail_Caption
data.value: Mission Failed!

data.name: Fail_Description
data.value: Mission has failed. Load your last safe (f5) to restore your progress or continue on without access to the final objective.

data.name: GPS_DroneWaypoint_01
data.value: Drone Waypoint

data.name: GPS_DroneWaypoint_01_Desc
data.value: Position of Drone Waypoint

data.name: GPS_PirateDrone_01
data.value: Pirate drone

data.name: GPS_PirateDrone_01_Desc
data.value: Location of Pirate drone

data.name: GPS_PirateFacility_01
data.value: Pirate Facility

data.name: GPS_PirateFacility_01_Desc
data.value: Position of Pirate Facility

data.name: GPS_PiratePlanet_01
data.value: Planet

data.name: GPS_PiratePlanet_01_Desc
data.value: Position of Planet

data.name: GPS_PirateShip_01
data.value: Pirate commander ship

data.name: GPS_PirateShip_01_Desc
data.value: Position of Pirate comander ship

data.name: Name
data.value: Learning to Survive

data.name: O_01x01_01_Description
data.value: To replenish oxygen and hydrogen at the survival kit you need power, a working conveyor connection between the H2/O2 generator, as well as a survival kit and ice in the H2/O2 generator.

data.name: O_01x01_01_Objective
data.value: Replenish your oxygen and hydrogen at a survival kit.

data.name: O_01x01_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Oxygen and Hydrogen

data.name: O_01x01_Hint
data.value:
Good job!
Tip: Put oxygen bottles inside the H2/O2 generator to refill them.

data.name: O_01x01_Name
data.value: Oxygen and Hydrogen

data.name: O_01x02_01_Description
data.value: These solar panels generate power when in contact with sunlight. This power is stored in batteries. Repair the solar panel to generate more power. You can find tools and components in the cargo container on the platform.

data.name: O_01x02_01_Objective
data.value: Use your welder to repair the solar panel.

data.name: O_01x02_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Solar Panels

data.name: O_01x02_Hint
data.value:
Well done!
Tip: Solar panels produce more power when facing the sun directly.

data.name: O_01x02_Name
data.value: Solar Panels

data.name: O_01x03_01_Description
data.value: The survival kit can produce small amounts of ingots from stone, produce basic components from ingots, allows you to recharge your energy as well as health, and allows you to respawn. Everything you need to get started.

data.name: O_01x03_01_Objective
data.value: Hold [{CONTROL:USE}] to recharge your health and energy from the console.

data.name: O_01x03_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Survival Kit

data.name: O_01x03_Hint
data.value:
Fantastic!
Tip: Connect the H2/O2 generator with the survival kit to recharge your hydrogen and oxygen as well.

data.name: O_01x03_Name
data.value: Survival Kit

data.name: O_01x04_01_Description
data.value: You can find ore inside asteroids and planets. Equip your drill to enable HUD markers that show you nearby locations of ore.

data.name: O_01x04_01_Objective
data.value: Locate, drill and pick up some iron ore.

data.name: O_01x04_Caption
data.value: Good.Bot: Mining

data.name: O_01x04_Hint
data.value:
Superb!
Tip: You can put this iron ore in a basic refinery to produce iron ingots.

data.name: O_01x04_Name
data.value: Mining

data.name: O_01x05_01_Description
data.value: This ship is locked to the platform with magnetic landing gear. Find a way to unlock the landing gear through the consoles or use your grinder to destroy it. Note that turning it off will not unlock it.

data.name: O_01x05_01_Objective
data.value: Disable the landing gear.

data.name: O_01x05_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Ship

data.name: O_01x05_Hint
data.value:
Awesome!
Tip: Try to fly the ship!

data.name: O_01x05_Name
data.value: Ship

data.name: O_01x06_01_Description
data.value: There is a useful utility ship here, but it needs to be repaired. The required components are likely near your current location.

data.name: O_01x06_01_Objective
data.value: Restore power to the utility ship.

data.name: O_01x06_02_Description
data.value: Great! Enter the cockpit to get started.

data.name: O_01x06_02_Objective
data.value: Enter the cockpit by pressing [{CONTROL:USE}] while facing the cockpit.

data.name: O_01x06_03_Description
data.value: Ship tools are useful to build or deconstruct blocks quickly and can store large quantities of components. Select one of the ship tools on your toolbar and use these to escape the hangar. Press [{CONTROL:LANDING_GEAR}] to turn off the landing gears.

data.name: O_01x06_03_Objective
data.value: Repair or grind down the doors to escape.

data.name: O_01x06_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Ship Tools

data.name: O_01x06_Hint
data.value:
Fine Work!
Tip: Ship welders use components from the ship inventory to construct blocks.

data.name: O_01x06_Name
data.value: Ship Tools

data.name: O_01x07_01_Description
data.value: There is a useful mining ship here, but it needs to be repaired. The required components are likely near your current location.

data.name: O_01x07_01_Objective
data.value: Restore power to the mining ship.

data.name: O_01x07_02_Description
data.value: Great! Enter the cockpit to get started.

data.name: O_01x07_02_Objective
data.value: Enter the cockpit by pressing [{CONTROL:USE}] while facing the cockpit.

data.name: O_01x07_03_Description
data.value: Select the drills on your toolbar and use the right mouse function to create a tunnel in order to escape. Press [{CONTROL:LANDING_GEAR}] to unlock the landing gears.

data.name: O_01x07_03_Objective
data.value: Find a way to escape with the mining ship.

data.name: O_01x07_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Ship Mining

data.name: O_01x07_Hint
data.value:
Brilliant!
Tip: While using drills, use [left-click] to collect ore and [right-click] to create tunnels fast.

data.name: O_01x07_Name
data.value: Ship Mining

data.name: O_02x01_01_Description
data.value: You can test your handheld weapons and try out ship weapons here.

data.name: O_02x01_01_Objective_01
data.value: Destroy targets

data.name: O_02x01_01_Objective_02
data.value: Fire Gatling gun

data.name: O_02x01_01_Objective_03
data.value: Fire missile launcher

data.name: O_02x01_02_Description
data.value: Excellent! You can repair the fighter ship and fly it home.

data.name: O_02x01_02_Objective
data.value: Restore power to the fighter.

data.name: O_02x01_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Weapons

data.name: O_02x01_Hint
data.value:
First-rate!
Tip: Weapons have a maximum range of 800m.

data.name: O_02x01_Name
data.value: Weapons

data.name: O_02x02_01_Description
data.value: This is a construction platform. It looks like there is enough materials to build your own ship. There is already a base to start from. Begin by adding a cockpit.

data.name: O_02x02_01_Objective
data.value: Add and weld a cockpit to control your ship.

data.name: O_02x02_02_Description
data.value: Good! Now you need functional thrusters in all six directions. Use ion thrusters for space travel. More thrusters means faster acceleration!

data.name: O_02x02_02_Objective
data.value: Weld thrusters in all six directions.

data.name: O_02x02_03_Description
data.value: A ship also needs gyroscopes for orientation. More gyroscopes means higher sensitivity.

data.name: O_02x02_03_Objective
data.value: Add and weld gyroscopes to your ship.

data.name: O_02x02_04_Description
data.value: Lastly, your ship needs power. Either build reactors and add fuel, or build batteries that come with a small amount of power.

data.name: O_02x02_04_Objective
data.value: Power your ship.

data.name: O_02x02_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Ship Building

data.name: O_02x02_Hint
data.value:
I couldn't have done it better myself!
Tip: Add more armor to protect the vital parts of your ship against collisions and weapons!

data.name: O_02x02_Name
data.value: Ship Building

data.name: O_02x03_01_Description
data.value: It looks like this place used to be pressurized. Pressurized rooms will replenish your oxygen and keep you warm. Repair the air vent to check the status of the room.

data.name: O_02x03_01_Objective
data.value: Repair the air vent.

data.name: O_02x03_02_Description
data.value: Perfect! But a yellow light on the air vent means the room is not sealed. Repair the holes in the walls and the door to make the room air tight.

data.name: O_02x03_02_Objective_01
data.value: Make the room airtight.

data.name: O_02x03_02_Objective_02
data.value: Repair the holes in the walls.

data.name: O_02x03_03_Description
data.value: Notice that the air vent now shows a green light, indicating the room is sealed. A connected H2\O2 generator can now produce oxygen from ice and use the vent to pressurize the room.

data.name: O_02x03_03_Objective
data.value: Store ice in the H2\O2 generator access port on the roof.

data.name: O_02x03_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Pressurization

data.name: O_02x03_Hint
data.value: Outstanding! Tip: Notice that your suit oxygen supply automatically replenishes when you are in pressurized environments.

data.name: O_02x03_Name
data.value: Pressurization

data.name: O_02x04_01_Description
data.value: This looks like an advanced production facility. There is already ore in the large container, but the conveyor tubes are unfinished. Conveyor tubes transport items between blocks.

data.name: O_02x04_01_Objective
data.value: Repair the conveyor tubes.

data.name: O_02x04_02_Description
data.value: The refinery will automatically pull ore from the container and refine it into ingots. These can be turned into components by an assembler.

data.name: O_02x04_02_Objective
data.value: Build and connect an assembler to the refinery.

data.name: O_02x04_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Production

data.name: O_02x04_Hint
data.value:
You learn quickly!
Tip: You can upgrade advanced refineries and assemblers with modules.

data.name: O_02x04_Name
data.value: Production

data.name: O_02x05_01_Description
data.value: There are batteries floating in space that can be used to power this facility. Grids can be merged together with merge blocks. Use the tugship to merge the batteries with the station.

data.name: O_02x05_01_Objective
data.value: Enter the tugship

data.name: O_02x05_02_Description
data.value: The ship is holding the batteries with its forward landing gears. Move the merge blocks close to each other so they can connect. Merge blocks will light up yellow when they get within range.

data.name: O_02x05_02_Objective
data.value: Connect the battery with the station

data.name: O_02x05_03_Description
data.value: Excellent! Power is restored. Now you can connect your ship with the station. Use your connector to form a temporary connection. Connectors will be illuminated by yellow light when in range

data.name: O_02x05_03_Objective
data.value: Press [{CONTROL:LANDING_GEAR}] when connectors are yellow to connect.

data.name: O_02x05_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Connections

data.name: O_02x05_Hint
data.value: You will be an expert in no time! Using connectors allow you to recharge ship batteries and transfer items.

data.name: O_02x05_Name
data.value: Connections

data.name: O_03x01_01_Description
data.value: Now that you have taken care of the drone, take out the stations defences next. Most turrets and weapons have 800M maximum range.

data.name: O_03x01_01_Objective_01
data.value: Disable turret 1.

data.name: O_03x01_01_Objective_02
data.value: Disable turret 2.

data.name: O_03x01_02_Description
data.value: This red signal indicates a hostile pirate station. These are often armed with automated turrets and drones.

data.name: O_03x01_02_Objective
data.value: Destroy the drone.

data.name: O_03x01_03_Description
data.value: Take out the station's antenna to prevent more drones from spawning.

data.name: O_03x01_03_Objective
data.value: Destroy the station's antenna.

data.name: O_03x01_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Combat

data.name: O_03x01_Hint
data.value:
Target neutralized!
Tip: Red signals can also indicate the presence of other players.

data.name: O_03x01_Name
data.value: Combat

data.name: O_03x02_01_Description
data.value: This looks like an automated construction facility. Projectors can be used to project saved blueprints of ships, so they can be reconstructed quickly.

data.name: O_03x02_01_Objective
data.value: Find a way to turn on the projector.

data.name: O_03x02_02_Description
data.value: A projector needs a connection with the blueprint from which you can start building. The station welders can do most of the work for you. The welders use components available in the station.

data.name: O_03x02_02_Objective
data.value: Build the projection.

data.name: O_03x02_03_Description
data.value: Marvelous! Now all you have to do is to find a way to disconnect your ship and add ammunition to the guns. Disconnect the ship from the station and try it out!

data.name: O_03x02_03_Objective
data.value: Move your new ship out of the hangar to test it.

data.name: O_03x02_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Projectors

data.name: O_03x02_Hint
data.value:
You made quick work of that!
Tip: You can use this facility or build your own to quickly build more ships. Remember to add fuel and ammunition!

data.name: O_03x02_Name
data.value: Projectors

data.name: O_03x03_01_Description
data.value: This looks like an old exploration ship. It is equipped with a jump drive. Jump drives are used to transport ships over great distances. Find a way to repair the jump drive.

data.name: O_03x03_01_Objective
data.value: Repair the jump drive.

data.name: O_03x03_02_Description
data.value: Jump drives can only be activated from a cockpit toolbar. Enter the control station and activate the jump drive. Remain seated while the jump drive powers up.

data.name: O_03x03_02_Objective
data.value: Perform a jump.

data.name: O_03x03_03_Description
data.value: Jump drives can also use GPS coordinates to jump. Use the GPS coordinates stored in the LCD panels on board this ship to find a hidden location.

data.name: O_03x03_03_Objective
data.value: Find the hidden base.

data.name: O_03x03_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Jump Drives

data.name: O_03x03_Hint
data.value:
Fasten your seatbelt!
Tip: Don't get out your seat while jumping, or you will be left behind!

data.name: O_03x03_Name
data.value: Jump Drives

data.name: O_03x04_01_Description
data.value: This facility repaired unmanned drones to mine, build and defend the area. To control a ship remotely, you need a remote control block and an antenna.

data.name: O_03x04_01_Objective_01
data.value: Repair the remote control block.

data.name: O_03x04_01_Objective_02
data.value: Add an antenna to the drone.

data.name: O_03x04_02_Description
data.value: To control a ship remotely, press [Shift-K] to enter the menu, which shows ships within your antenna range, then select control. Make sure your suit antenna is toggled on!

data.name: O_03x04_02_Objective
data.value: Take control of the drone remotely.

data.name: O_03x04_03_Description
data.value: Fly the drone to the waypoint to test your drone. Don’t go too far though, your antennae need to stay within range of each other.

data.name: O_03x04_03_Objective
data.value: Fly the drone towards the GPS.

data.name: O_03x04_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Remote Control

data.name: O_03x04_Hint
data.value:
Talk about precision flying!
Tip: Drones are handy if you like to build cheap and small ships.

data.name: O_03x04_Name
data.value: Remote Control

data.name: O_03x05_01_Description
data.value: There is a small mining ship here that uses hydrogen thrusters. Hydrogen thrusters are powerful but require hydrogen to function. A ship can produce hydrogen from ice using a H2/O2 generator

data.name: O_03x05_01_Objective
data.value: Add Ice to the ship’s H2/O2 generator.

data.name: O_03x05_02_Description
data.value: The rear thrusters do not have conveyor connections with the hydrogen tank. Repair or add conveyor tubes to restore the fuel supply to the thrusters.

data.name: O_03x05_02_Objective
data.value: Restore the fuel supply to the rear hydrogen thrusters.

data.name: O_03x05_03_Description
data.value: Splendid! You can now use the ship's drills to mine more ice so it can refuel itself.

data.name: O_03x05_03_Objective
data.value: Mine ice using the miner ship.

data.name: O_03x05_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Hydrogen Thrusters

data.name: O_03x05_Hint
data.value:
Magnificent!
Tip: Hydrogen thrusters can be used to escape planetary gravity.

data.name: O_03x05_Name
data.value: Hydrogen Thrusters

data.name: O_0Fx01_01_Description
data.value: Well done, engineer! Now it is time to put your new skills to the test. There is a planet nearby, which is controlled by a pirate faction. Find the planet and take out the pirates.

data.name: O_0Fx01_01_Objective
data.value: Reach the planet.

data.name: O_0Fx01_02_Description
data.value: Great job; you reached the planet! There is a pirate facility controlling the planet. It is up to you to find a way to disable it.

data.name: O_0Fx01_02_Objective_01
data.value: Disable the pirate facility.

data.name: O_0Fx01_02_Objective_02
data.value: Disable pirate facility 2.

data.name: O_0Fx01_02_Objective_03
data.value: Disable pirate facility 3.

data.name: O_0Fx01_03_Description
data.value: Outstanding work! With the destruction of this facility the pirate commander has revealed himself in orbit above the planet. You know what to do!

data.name: O_0Fx01_03_Objective
data.value: Destroy the pirate commander ship.

data.name: O_0Fx01_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Final Objective

data.name: O_0Fx01_Fail
data.value: Not all tasks were completed successfully, the final objective will remain unavailable until your next play trough

data.name: O_0Fx01_Hint
data.value:
Excellent!
Tip: Share your experiences with other players, team up next time or compete against each other for new experiences!

data.name: O_InitialQuest
data.value: There are small tasks for you to perform, these tasks can be activated by finding and activating specific button panels. There are several such button panels on this platform, go try it out!

data.name: O_InitialQuest_Caption
data.value: Good.bot: Tasks

data.name: Persons_VirtualAssistant
data.value: Good.bot

data.name: QuestlogDetail_Failed
data.value: Objective has been failed.

data.name: QuestlogDetail_Success
data.value: Objective was completed successfully.
